channel.title: Projects on David J Nevin
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on David J Nevin

item.title: Visual Site Map
item.description: A Dynamically Created Site Map using Mermaid The title say’s it all, but to clarify, with a single script run a new and updated site map should be created using Mermaid code based on the automatic XML sitemap generated by the Hugo site build command.

item.title: Tag Generator for Hugo Posts
item.description: Tag Generator for Hugo Posts Using the existing content of the posts in this code section, I want to run a script to automatically generate suitable tags for each post and insert those tags into each post in the front matter.
